mapper.select:
select fid id,fwelder_no welderNo,fname welderName from tb_welder where 1=1
and ${str}
select fequipment_no fequipment_no from tb_welding_machine where fposition=#{fposition}
select fid fdi,fname fdn,fparent fdp,ftype fdt from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fparent=#{fci}
select tb_users.users_insframework from tb_users where tb_users.id=#{fci}
select fid fdn from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fname=#{fdn}
select fname fcn from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fid=#{fci}
select tb_welder.fname from tb_welder where tb_welder.fwelder_no=#{fci}
select fposition from tb_welding_machine where fequipment_no=#{equip}

select wm.fid id,fequipment_no fequipment_no,fposition fposition,finsframework_id fci,tb_insframework.fname fcn,d.fvaluename model,wm.ftype_id fdi from tb_welding_machine wm LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = wm.fmodel LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ON wm.finsframework_id=tb_insframework.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = tb_insframework.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid=ins.fparent where d.ftypeid=17 and wm.check= 0
and (tb_insframework.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
order by fequipment_no asc

select wm.fid id,wm.fequipment_no fequipment_no,wm.finsframework_id fci,tb_insframework.fname fcn,d.fvaluename model,wm.ftype_id fdi,r.weldmachine,w.fequipment_no fpn from tb_robot wm LEFT JOIN tb_robot_weld r on r.robot_id = wm.fid LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w on w.fid = r.weldmachine LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = wm.fmodel LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ON wm.finsframework_id=tb_insframework.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = tb_insframework.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid=ins.fparent where d.ftypeid=17
and (tb_insframework.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
order by fequipment_no asc

select w.fname fname,fwelder_no fwelder_no from tb_welder w LEFT JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.Fowner LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})

select sum(wtime) worktime,time from ( SELECT count(fid) wtime,count(fid) time from tb_live_data where FWeldTime >= #{time} and FWeldTime < date_sub(date_sub(#{time},interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) and fmachine_id=#{machineid} and fstatus!=0 UNION ALL SELECT count(fid) wtime,0 time from tb_live_data where FWeldTime >= #{time} and FWeldTime < date_sub(date_sub(#{time},interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) and fmachine_id=#{machineid} and fstatus=0)temp
